tit.j: カトリック西陣聖ヨゼフ教会
tit.e: St. Joseph Roman Catholic Church, Nishijin
St. Joseph Roman Catholic Church, Nishijin
St. Joseph Roman Catholic Church, Nishijin

sen.j: カトリック西陣聖ヨゼフ教会は、京都市上京区にある教会。
sen.e: St. Joseph Roman Catholic Church, Nishijin, is located in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City.
St. Joseph Roman Catholic Church, Nishijin, is located in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City.
St. Joseph Roman Catholic Church, Nishijin, is located in Kamigyo-ku Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 1890年 パリ外国宣教会によって河原町聖フランシスコ・ザビエル教会が建てられる。
sen.e: 1890: St. Francis Xavier Church (Kawaramachi Church) was built by La Societe des Missions Etrangeres de Paris.
1890: St. Francis Xavier Church (Kawaramachi Church) was built by La Societe des Missions Etrangeres de Paris.
1890: St. Francis Xavier Church (Kawaramachi Church) was built by La Societe des Missions Etrangeres de Paris.

sen.j: 1907年頃 二条新町に西陣教会創立。
sen.e: Around 1907: The Nishijin Church (St. Joseph's Church) was established in Nijo-Shinmachi.
Around 1907: The Nishijin Church (St. Joseph's Church) was established in Nijo-Shinmachi.
Around 1907: The Nishijin Church (St. Joseph's Church) was established in Nijo-Shinmachi.

sen.j: 京都で第2番目のカトリック聖堂だった。
sen.e: It was the second Catholic church in Kyoto.
It was the second Catholic church in Kyoto.
It was the second Catholic church in Kyoto.

sen.j: その後、大宮下立売へ移転する。
sen.e: Later, it moved to Omiya-Shimodachiuri.
Later, it moved to Omiya-Shimodachiuri.
Later, it moved to Omiya-Shimodachiuri.

sen.j: 1909年 黒門中立売へ移転する。
sen.e: 1909: It moved to Kuromon-Nakadachiuri.
1909: It moved to Kuromon-Nakadachiuri.
1909: Moved to Kuromon-Nakadachiuri.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 1917年 教会一時閉鎖。
sen.e: 1917: The church was closed temporarily.
1917: The church was closed temporarily.
1917: Closed temporarily.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.e: (Until around 1930)
(Until around 1930)
(Until around 1930)

sen.j: 1930年 新町一条上るへ移転、その後大宮笹屋町に移転する。
sen.e: 1930: It moved to Shinmachi-Ichijo-agaru and then to Omiya-Sasaya-cho.
1930: It moved to Shinmachi-Ichijo-agaru and then to Omiya-Sasaya-cho.
1930: Moved to Ichijo Agaru, Shinmachi and then to Omiya-Sasaya-cho.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 1935年 大宮中立売へ移転。
sen.e: 1935: It moved to Omiya-Nakadachiuri.
1935: It moved to Omiya-Nakadachiuri.
1935: Moved to Omiya-Nakadachiuri.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 1937年 京都知牧区、大阪教区より分離。
sen.e: 1937: The Prefecture Apostolic of Kyoto was separated from the Archdiocese of Osaka
1937: The Prefecture Apostolic of Kyoto was separated from the Archdiocese of Osaka
1937: The Prefecture Apostolic of Kyoto was separated from the Archdiocese of Osaka

sen.j: メリノール宣教会宣教師が着任。
sen.e: A missionary of the Mary knoll mission arrived at the church to take his or her new post.
A missionary of the Mary knoll mission arrived at the church to take his or her new post.
A missionary of the Mary knoll mission arrived at the church to take his or her new post.

sen.j: 1939年 現在地（新町通一条上る）へ移転。
sen.e: 1939: It moved to the present site (in Ichijo-agaru, Shinmachi-dori Street).
1939: It moved to the present site (in Ichijo-agaru, Shinmachi-dori Street).
1939: Moved to the present site (in Ichijo Agaru, Shinmachi-dori Street).
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 1941年 戦争のため、教会閉鎖。
sen.e: 1941: The church was closed due to the war.
1941: The church was closed due to the war.
1941: Closed due to the war.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.e: (Until 1946)
(Until 1946)
(Until 1946)

sen.j: 1946年 衣笠教会、小山教会が西陣教会より独立。
sen.e: 1946: The Kinugasa church and the Koyama church became independent of the Nishijin church (St. Joseph's Church)
1946: The Kinugasa church and the Koyama church became independent of the Nishijin church (St. Joseph's Church)
1946: The Kinugasa church and the Koyama church became independent of the Nishijin church.
sen.cmt: 前出補足をのぞきました。

sen.j: 1949年 現在の聖堂が建つ。
sen.e: 1949: The present church was built.
1949: The present church was built.
1949: The present church was built.

sen.j: 聖堂献堂式－8.15。
sen.e: The completion of the church was celebrated.
The completion of the church was celebrated.
The completion of the church was celebrated - 8.15.
sen.cmt: 文末の「8.15」の意味が確認できず、そのまま表記しています。

sen.j: 1951年 京都知牧区、カトリック京都司教区となる。
sen.e: 1951: The Prefecture Apostolic of Kyoto became Catholic Kyoto Diocese.
1951: The Prefecture Apostolic of Kyoto became Catholic Kyoto Diocese.
1951: The Prefecture Apostolic of Kyoto became Catholic Kyoto Diocese.

sen.j: 初代京都司教、古屋司教。
sen.e: The first Bishop of Kyoto was Bishop Furuya.
The first Bishop of Kyoto was Bishop Furuya.
The first Bishop of Kyoto was Bishop Furuya.

sen.j: 602-0934 京都市上京区新町通一条通上ル一条殿町502-1
sen.e: 602-0934, 502-1 Ichijoden-cho, Shinmachi-dori Street Ichijo-dori Street agaru, Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City
602-0934, 502-1 Ichijoden-cho, Shinmachi-dori Street Ichijo-dori Street agaru, Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City
502-1 Ichijoden-cho, Ichijo-dori Street Agaru, Shinmachi-dori Street, Kamigyo-ku Ward, Kyoto City 602-0934
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄烏丸線今出川駅徒歩10分
sen.e: The Karasuma Line of Kyoto City Subway: ten minutes on foot from Imadegawa Station
The Karasuma Line of Kyoto City Subway: ten minutes on foot from Imadegawa Station
Ten minutes on foot from Imadegawa Station of the Karasuma Line of Kyoto City Subway.

sen.j: 市バス 59・201・203系統「上京区総合庁舎」 南へ徒歩5分
sen.e: Route 59, 201 or 203 of Kyoto City Bus: five minutes on foot from the "Kamigyoku Sogochosha (Kamigyo Ward General Office)" bus stop
Route 59, 201 or 203 of Kyoto City Bus: five minutes on foot from the "Kamigyoku Sogochosha (Kamigyo Ward General Office)" bus stop
Five minutes on foot to the south from the 'Kamigyoku Sogochosha' (Kamigyo-ku Ward General Office) bus stop of Route 59, 201 or 203 of Kyoto City Bus.

sen.j: 市バス 9・12・50・61・67系統「一条戻橋」 東へ徒歩5分
sen.e: Route 9, 12, 50, 61 or 67 of Kyoto City Bus: five minutes on foot to the east from the "Ichijo Modori-bashi Bridge" bus stop
Route 9, 12, 50, 61 or 67 of Kyoto City Bus: five minutes on foot to the east from the "Ichijo Modori-bashi Bridge" bus stop
Five minutes on foot to the east from the 'Ichijo Modori-bashi' bus stop of Route 9, 12, 50, 61 or 67 of Kyoto City Bus.
